main

Class WeightingFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.WeightingFunction

  • public class WeightingFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    arno This is the weighting function. It combines several mods.LocationEstimationVector and uses static or dynamic weighting.

      • getBaseWeighting

        private double getBaseWeighting(Emulateable mod)
        These are fixed values for Base Weighting - where -1 denotes a synchronization point of exclusively priority
        Parameters:
        mod - the emulator providing data
        Returns:
        the factor used for the weighting base
